AMICertificateCollection.description: This is the schema definition for the AMICertificateCollection.
AMICertificateCollection.longDescription: This schemas defines the properties and actions which is used in the AMI Certificate collection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClientCertificates.description: The link to a collection of LDAP Client Certificate used to view and upload LDAP Client Certificate used for LDAP SSL/StartTLS authentication.
ClientCertificates.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type CertificateCollection, used to view and upload LDAP Client Certificate used for LDAP SSL/StartTLS authentication.
